actions.name: Plus
actions.description: Effect: If there is at least one other allied creature with the Minus, Cationic or Anionic Ability on the field, the user's ATK stat is increased by 50%. If the user is within 5m of an ally with the Minus, Cationic, or Anionic Ability, they gain the effect of that Ability.
